effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.sun_moon: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.
